name: Katy and Bob Way Back Home
description: Help Katy and Bob to return home while playing this amazing game in time management genre! Make different cocktails and juices, grow fruits. Surprise your customers with joyful fireworks. Treat you customers with free glass of cold water – at such heat it will be easier for them to wait for the order. Complete extra tasks and get gold coins. Buy artifacts to make the game easier. Improve your bar. You will meet funny customers and also discover a top secret – why Katy and Bob have found themselves so far away from home!
